channel.title: Some people are so god damn stupid
channel.description:
I was going to a town nearby to get some food and when I was coming back this happened:
I was with a friend we were coming back and we see this kid that is standing in the middle of our lane talking on his cell phone. We are about 5 fucking feet from this kid when we noticed him and swerve out of the way. So what he does when we are almost off the road? He jumps back and eggs the fucking car.
I am so pissed off at what a retard this kid is. What if another car was coming? He would of caused an accident. What if someone older was driving our car?
We didn't get out of the car(we didn't think about it), so we went to our dumbass police station. Guess what, it's the biggest dickhead cop in our town. We tell him about it and he's like, "Oh...that place is Grant County's jurisdiction(WE ARE IN GOD DAMN GRANT COUNTY). He is a lazy bastard so he went to check it out and didn't even stop to do anything.
Moral of this story: Some people are too fucking stupid to live on this earth.
Sorry for the pointless thread, but holy shit I am PO'ed :P
